alert.note: Alert for Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 14 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Putnam and southeast Clay Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Bostwick, or 11 miles north of Palatka, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bostwick. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Clay; Eastern Putnam; Western Clay; Western Putnam
